name: Puffer Putt
description:
Escape the aquarium by shooting the pufferfish through multiple different puzzles! Manage your water by controlling the strength of the shot and refill it by landing in water. Try to go on Par by completing a level with the least amount of shots. 

Controls:

WASD - Move in bodies of water

Hold and Drag Left Click to shoot the pufferfish in a direction

F - Expand and Spike

ESC - Pause Menu

This game was created by the ISU Game Dev Club Challenge Project
